alert.note: Alert for Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Perry; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:51PM CDT until May 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Perry County in central Arkansas... Garland County in central Arkansas... Saline County in central Arkansas... Northern Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 350 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Adona to near Lake Ouachita State Park to near Muddy Creek WMA, moving southeast at 40 mph. These storms have a history of wind damage and large hail! HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Hot Springs... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Malvern... Mount Ida... Haskell... Mountain Pine... Rockport... Traskwood... Norman... Perla... Lonsdale... Meyers... Jessieville... Lake Ouachita State Park... Lofton... Rockwell... Mauldin... Salem in Saline County... Williams Junction... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 91 and 116. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Garland; Hot Spring; Montgomery; Perry; Saline
